name: nodm
description: NodeJS ODM for NoSQL, Couchbase, Redis

scripts.test: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec -t 10000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.doc: node ./node_modules/jsdox/bin/jsdox --output doc/api main.js src && node ./node_modules/jsdox/bin/jsdox --output doc/api/behaviours src/behaviours && node ./node_modules/jsdox/bin/jsdox --output doc/api/validators src/validators

author: Ioan CHIRIAC
